title: Publication
description: A published version of a monograph.

status.description: Whether the publication is Queued (not yet scheduled for publication), Declined, Published or Scheduled (scheduled for publication at a future date). One of the `PKPPublication::STATUS_*` constants. Default is `PKPPublication::STATUS_QUEUED`.

chapters.description: A list of chapters that have been created for this publication.

seriesId.description: The id of the series this publication appears in.

seriesPosition.description: The position of this publication in the series, such as Volume 2 or Book 2.

chapterLicenseUrl.description: A URL to a webpage describing the default license terms for chapters of this publication.
